definition: to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm

sentences.english: The beautiful view from the top of the mountain took my breath away.
sentences.chinese: 從山頂上看到的美景，使我驚羨不已。

sentences.english: But in language and literature the accomplishments were breathtaking.
sentences.chinese: 而在語言及文學方面，其成就是日漸令人驚羨的。
